articles.content:

articles.description: Authorities in Norway euthanized a beloved local walrus called Freya after she became stressed by crowds who gathered to watch her sunbathe.

articles.title: Kansas abortion vote recount by hand approved, despite 165,000 margin
articles.description: A Kansas resident Melissa Leavitt's request to recount the abortion vote, citing that she had "seen data," was upheld. But she must pay a $200,000 bond.
